project.logic

Class SystemNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.logic.SystemNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SystemNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class holds the information and methods about computer system node.
    Author:
    Yaroslav
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double cx
      Center X coordinate of the system node rectangle.
      double cy
      Center Y coordinate of the system node rectangle.
      static int nextIndex
      This static field is used to define IDs of the created system nodes.
      static double size
      This is the size of system node rectangle side.

      • linkTimeIntervalIsBusy

        public boolean linkTimeIntervalIsBusy(int startTime,
                             int endTime,
                             int linkNum)
        Checks the state of the link on the specified period of time.
        Parameters:
        startTime - first tact
        endTime - last tact
        linkNum - link number
        Returns:
        true if at least one tact on the specified period is busy

      • linkTimeIntervalIsBusy

        public boolean linkTimeIntervalIsBusy(int startTime,
                             int endTime,
                             int linkNum,
                             int inOutState)
        Almost the same as previous method, but this one works for duplex links and has additional parameter.
        Parameters:
        startTime - first tact
        endTime - last tact
        linkNum - link number
        inOutState - 1 for IN state, 0 for OUT state
        Returns:
        true if at least one tact on the specified period is busy
